instruction: Write a daily exercise routine for Monday to Sunday with a rest day in between, each day summarized in 160 characters or less
output:
Monday: Cardio (30 min), Strength Training (30 min), Yoga (30 min)
Tuesday: Cardio (30 min), Strength Training (30 min), Pilates (30 min)
Wednesday: Rest Day
Thursday: Cardio (30 min), Strength Training (30 min), Dance (30 min)
Friday: Cardio (30 min), Strength Training (30 min), Tai Chi (30 min)
Saturday: Cardio (30 min), Strength Training (30 min), HIIT (30 min)
Sunday: Cardio (30 min), Strength Training (30 min), Stretching (30 min)

This routine includes a variety of exercises to keep you active and healthy throughout the week, with a rest day on Wednesday to allow your body to recover. Remember to consult with a doctor before starting any new exercise routine.
